attributes.action: request his Secretary of State to reconsider, and amend, the three proposed locations for CATS sites in Cumbria at Carlisle, Workington and Ulverston to include a more central site such as Penrith so that patients in the Eden Valley will be able to attend within the recommended times without having to resort to the services of the Air Ambulance..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The so called public consultation process regarding the Cumbria NHS Primary Care Trust Clinical Assessment and Treatment Centre has made a totally mockery of the democratic process. Decisions based upon specious demographic data, were apparently already set in concrete prior to any consultions.
The locations of the proposed (actual predetermined) centres at Carlisle, Workington and Ulverston will be extremely difficult, if not impossible, for Eden Valley residents to use and return home by public transport within a 24 hour period.
